All those reviews that say this game is fun lie.
This game has shit balance, the worse fucking matchmaking ever, and devs who do not know their community yet we all still play this shit game.

9/10 increased my depression!

Look at me, I am a horse for god's sake and this game applies to me. This game would be even better though If I had opposable thumbs... so your human advantages will make this game great for anyone willing to play. Neigh!
Really good PvP Horror game! The Dev team sometimes makes questionable choices on updates and patches but otherwise is an overall good game most of the time!
Managed to escape by the 10th match but it doesn't take a genius to understand that this game is far from balanced, this is worse than dota

A very addicting game with a community of either toxic A**hats or genuinely nice people. I've actually run into more cool people than not. I recommend playing survivor with friends, and killer when playing solo (duh). It has it's issues, but I can't deny how much I love this it. <3

This game is just too unbalanced too be fun. And I am talking about the Killers. In this game, there is basically no way to succeed as killer other than playing Nurse, Spirit, Hillbilly or Huntress. All other killers are way too weak to do anything. Additionally most survivors are toxic af. The worst part is that the devs dont care to make the killers stronger. Such devs shouldn't be supported. I don't recommend buying this trash.

Developers as a respectfull player I just want to say it's not fun to play survivor in dead by daylight without friends this game has so much potential but please make both sides equal so you actually need skill to win not just hold m1 and hit the easiest skillchecks
Bon jeu, mais SURTOUT ne pas tryhard. Restez a faire deux trois parties, de temps en temps, ou vous allez vraiment exploser.

This is one of the worst games on steam. The gameplay is fine, but it is the community and especially the des that would have given Hitler a run for their money in term on tyranny and hate. The player base is extremely toxic and the devs are the worst of them all. They do not listen to player feedback they are so unbelievably naive about their own game it is scary.
edit: If you wonder why I still play it, it is because the wife likes it, though I hate the game.

Absolutely unplayable half the time whether it's lag spikes and glitches or losing tons of progression due to saving issues. The devs really need to work on fixing these major game breaking bugs. It doesn't make sense as to why they haven't been resolved considering how popular the game is. But, until they are I won't reccommend getting the game, save yourself the headache.
